dialogue.name: Bezos
dialogue.text: We're cut from the same cloth, you and I...

dialogue.name: Bezos
dialogue.text: So why do I hate you so much...

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: I'll answer that question if you answer mine.

dialogue.name: Bezos
dialogue.text: Will you answer my question now?

dialogue.name: Bezos
dialogue.text: Ugh Elon why do you have to be like that? That's exactly why I hate you so much!

dialogue.name: Elon
dialogue.text: Tell your wife I said "hi" and that I'll see her later tonight.

accusation.name: Bezos
accusation.text: I've been waiting for this moment for so long.

accusation.name: Bezos
accusation.text: I finally have an opportunity to kill you.
